description.narrative: Improved capacity of judicial system to detect, investigate and prosecute the crimes against children, especially the crimes against girls and adolescent girls., which contributes to Access To Justice, Justice For Children, Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2019, girls and boys benefit from and access decentralized child protection mechanisms and programmes that prevent and protect them from violation of rights, primarily violence, abuse, exploitation and neglect.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved capacity of judicial system to detect, investigate and prosecute the crimes against children, especially the crimes against girls and adolescent girls.

description.narrative: UNICEF continuó apoyando los procesos de especialización del personal que integra las instancias del Sector Justicia (Organismo Judicial, Ministerio Público y Policía Nacional Civil), acompañando la implementación de protocolos y guías para la atención a niñez víctima de violencia, atendidos por juzgados de familia, niñez y penales. También apoyo en los procesos de atención directa a los Adolescentes en Conflicto con la Ley Penal y Niñez en la Policía Nacional Civil y en el Ministerio Público. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Number of institutions (Judiciary, Office of the Public Prosecutor and Police) implementing international standards that prevent re-victimization.

actual.value: 2016:The institutions received training and in many cases, necessary equipment/installation. Additional efforts need to be made to fully implement the measures to prevent re-victimization.
